short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your ManageBac downloads by subject.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The essential ManageBac Chrome extension that automatically sorts your downloaded files for you!

WARNING: This extension is currently in alpha version. Mind the bugs.

To activate:
1. Go to your ManageBac page and press the ManageFiles icon
2. Click on Initialize Classes
3. Voila! Your class list has been initialized!

Contribute on Github: https://github.com/jinh0/managefiles/!
